```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(modelsummary)
library(data.table)
```


```{r}
load("~/qmer/Data/ECLS_K/2011/eclska.Rdata")
eclskdes <- copy(eclska)
eclskdes[ , c("id", "pid", "Time"):=NULL]
```

```{r}

datasummary_skim(eclskdes)
```

```{r}
datasummary_skim(eclskdes, type = "categorical")
```

```{r}
datasummary_balance(1 ~ Race, data = eclskdes, dinm = FALSE)
```
```{r}
datasummary_crosstab(Race ~ Sex, data = eclskdes)
```

```{r}

`Mean (SD)` <- function(x) {
  ifelse(Mean(x) > 0, paste0(Mean(x, fmt = 2)," (",SD(x, fmt = 2),")"),
         NA)
}

datasummary(Time ~ (Math+Reading+Science)*(N + `Mean (SD)`), eclska)
```

```{r}
datasummary_correlation(eclskdes)
```
